author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

Part of the migrations in #31061 and #36404.
Went systematically through all of the CMSDEPRECATED_X warnings in the `RecoPixelVertexing` subsystem from `CMSSW_12_3_CMSDEPRECATED_X_2022-01-21-2300` and removed all deprecated EventSetup API calls.

#### PR validation:

`cmssw` compiles. 
Run successfully: `runTheMatrix.py -l limited --ibeos`

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

N/A
title: Finalize esConsumes in `RecoPixelVertexing`
